body:
Dear Elite Audio Buyers Team,

I hope this email finds you well! I am writing to you today with a very important inquiry regarding a potential bulk purchase of 50 Bose QuietComfort Ultra headphones for an influencer campaign we are organizing. Time is of the essence, as we need to finalize everything by the end of this week.

First of all, I wanted to mention that I tried calling your support line earlier today, but unfortunately, I was on hold for over 40 minutes and couldn’t get through. I completely understand how busy you must be, so I thought it might be better to reach out via email instead.

My main question is about custom branding options for the headphones. We would love to know if it’s possible to add our logo or any custom designs to the headphones for this campaign. If so, could you please provide details on pricing, turnaround time, and any other requirements? Also, if there’s any discount available for bulk orders like this, that would be fantastic to know!

I truly appreciate your time and assistance with this matter. Please let me know at your earliest convenience—we’re really excited about this collaboration and want to make sure everything goes smoothly.

Thank you so very much in advance for your help!
